Posts.Content: Sep 7, 2012 10:18AM Spirit_eyes wrote: I'm in kinda the same boat. I just did my first round of chemo. Honestly, everyone there was beyond great. Almost makes you want to go there. They fed me, offered warm blankets, cable tv, wifi, etc. felt like I was at a spa, and not getting chemo.
